thread.title: Why Are We So Captivated By This Video Of Student-Built Bridges Being Strength-Tested?
thread.title_full: Why Are We So Captivated By This Video Of Student-Built Bridges Being Strength-Tested?

title: Why Are We So Captivated By This Video Of Student-Built Bridges Being Strength-Tested?
text: THE SUSPENSION IS KILLING US Why Are We So Captivated By This Video Of Student-Built Bridges Being Strength-Tested? 0 diggs Design Video It's a ten minute video a teacher methodically pouring sand into a bucket until bridge after bridge breaks, and somehow we can't look away?
